math

Class Base

  • java.lang.Object
    • math.Value3D
      • math.Structure3D
        • math.Base

  • public class Base
extends Structure3D
    Class that mathematically represents the base of a tank
    Version:
    May 5, 2018
    Author:
    Nikash Walia, Maithreyee Vatsan, Roopak Phatak, Period: 2, Assignment: Tanks, Sources: none

            int y,

            double angle,

        Constructor for Base
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of center
        y - y-coordinate of center
        z - z-coordinate of center
        angle - angle of structure
        l - length of base
        w - width of base
        h - height of base

    • Method Detail

      • translate

        public void translate()
        Translates the base according to its various properties. Changes include setting angular velocity, updating the timestamp, accelerating or decelerating the structure, and then changing its position and angle accordingly.
        Specified by:
        translate in class Structure3D

      • hasCollided

        public int hasCollided(Structure3D other)
        method for checking whether or not the base has collided with another. Uses an approximation of distance from center to center and compares it with half of the hypotenuse of the base's bottom rectangle
        Specified by:
        hasCollided in class Structure3D
        Parameters:
        other - structure to check against
        Returns:
        corner that has collided, or -1 if no collision
